name: Pass The Forest
description:
You need to deliver cookies to your granny's house,but, be careful! The wolfs also like cookies!

__________________________________________________________________________

  • CONTROLS:
    • Use the arrow keys to move right (←) and left (→) and ( ↑ ) to jump.
    • Click to interact and advance in the initial scene.

__________________________________________________________________________

  • CREDITS:
    • Music:
      • Level: Forest by Pixel Beats
      • Game Over: Game Over by MB Music
      • Win Sound And Menu: I think they were from a free sounds page but I couldn't find them. :(
    • Programming, UI and Art by me.

__________________________________________________________________________

-Plese check the Options menu to adjust the volume and change the language (English or Spanish)

-This was the first game I ever made and finished! :D

-I made this game for a final work the first year of my studies (like 2 years ago) , I don't plan on continuing it so I added and changed a few little things to make it a little better. It may or not recive some future update for small things like: make collisions better or fix some visual things that happen with the ground (It seems to happen only the Web version) like i did with the water.

-If the end becomes a little difficult to pass... maybe there is another way ;)

-Just 1 ending, collecting all the flowers doesn't do anything (at least for now) but if you want to because you are a hard completionist (like me) go ahead ;)

__________________________________________________________________________
